mapper.select: SELECT U.RN, U.UPLOAD_NO, U.EMP_NO, U.BOARD_TITLE, U.BOARD_CONTENT, U.CREATE_DATE, U.MODIFY_DATE, U.HIT FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY UPLOAD_NO DESC) AS RN, UPLOAD_NO, EMP_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, HIT FROM UPLOAD) U WHERE U.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO UPLOAD (UPLOAD_NO, EMP_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, HIT) VALUES (UPLOAD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{empNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0)
INSERT INTO ATTACH (ATTACH_NO, UPLOAD_NO, EMP_NO, PATH, ORIGIN, FILESYSTEM) VALUES (ATTACH_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{uploadNo}, #{empNo}, #{path}, #{origin}, #{filesystem})
mapper.select: SELECT ATTACH_NO, UPLOAD_NO, EMP_NO, PATH, ORIGIN, FILESYSTEM FROM ATTACH WHERE PATH = CONCAT('stoarge\\',TO_CHAR(SYSDATE -1, 'yyyy\\mm\\dd'))
